hero.title: ZO Chemical Peel Edinburgh
hero.subtitle: Refresh & Rejuvenate with ZO Chemical Peels
hero.description: Beautiful skin is the ultimate confidence. Our industry-leading ZO Chemical Peel treatments in Edinburgh combine clinical expertise with luxury care, leaving your complexion brighter, smoother, and effortlessly radiant. See visible results after just one session, with continued improvements as your skin regenerates. Suitable for all skin types—even if you're new to chemical peels. Professional blends of AHAs deliver gentle yet effective resurfacing with no downtime. These peels amplify the absorption of your at-home ZO routine, maximising daily results.

treatmentInfo.results: Fresh radiance immediately, with full benefits emerging over several days. Results last 4–6 weeks. Optimal transformation with 3–6 treatments spaced 3–4 weeks apart
treatmentInfo.price: Starting at £91 per chemical peel session
benefits: Smooth uneven texture and refine pores for softer, luminous skin
Balance oil production to reduce breakouts and blemishes

Boost collagen and elastin to improve firmness and elasticity
In-and-out treatment that fits effortlessly into your schedule
Quick and noticeable results from the first appointment
No downtime - most clients resume activities immediately
